name: Orb of Venom
description: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.

abilities.name: Poison Attack
abilities.description: The next attack poisons the target, dealing damage over time. This attack cannot miss.
notes: The effects are calculated upon reaching the attack point, not upon landing an attack
For ranged heroes, this is upon projectile launch
The attack has True Strike, so it cannot miss
Reapplying the debuff refreshes the duration
Does not affect Buildings, Ward-type units, or Ally units
The attacks first apply the debuff, then their own attack damage
Deals damage in 1-second intervals, starting 1 second after the debuff is applied, resulting in 3 instances
Can deal up to 30 damage (before reductions)
The damage from Poison Attack is direct HP Removal, so it does not trigger any on-damage effects

recommendedHeroes: Generally picked up by melee heroes who intend to harass their opponents in the lane
trivia: This item is based on the Orb of Venom from Warcraft 3

Orb of Venom's lore 'Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.' is a reference to the quote of V for Vendetta. 'Weapon' was intentionally written wrong, with a V, for the reference's sake

recentChanges.description: Increased gold cost from 250 to 350. No longer builds into Orb of Corrosion. Now builds into Mage Slayer. Now builds into Witch Blade. REWORKED Poison Attack.
Reduced Poison Attack melee movement speed slow from 15% to 13%. Now builds into Orb of Corrosion. Reduced gold cost from 300 to 275.
